# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.44.35207/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.44.35207/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe")
project(imgui LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(ImGuiExample "")
set_target_properties(ImGuiExample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "ImGuiExample")
set_target_properties(ImGuiExample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
add_dependencies(ImGuiExample imgui)
target_include_directories(ImGuiExample PRIVATE
    CustomTreeNode/src
    Vendor/imgui-docking
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends
    Vendor/imgui-docking/misc/cpp
)
target_include_directories(ImGuiExample SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/zhaoys-c/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3cd4fd5b105e4808a2c178353b65ecf1/include
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.4.304.1/include
)
target_compile_definitions(ImGuiExample PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
    NOMINMAX
)
target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-G>
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(ImGuiExample PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET ImGuiExample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDebugDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(ImGuiExample PRIVATE
    glfw3
    opengl32
    slang
    shaderc_combined
    spirv-cross-core
    spirv-cross-cpp
    spirv-cross-glsl
    spirv-cross-hlsl
    dxcompiler
    vulkan-1
    imgui
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
)
target_link_directories(ImGuiExample PRIVATE
    C:/Users/zhaoys-c/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3cd4fd5b105e4808a2c178353b65ecf1/lib
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.4.304.1/lib
    build/windows/x64/debug
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target ImGuiExample
target_sources(ImGuiExample PRIVATE 
    CustomTreeNode/src/main.cpp
)

# target
add_library(imgui STATIC "")
set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "imgui")
set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(imgui PRIVATE
    Vendor/imgui-docking
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends
    Vendor/imgui-docking/misc/cpp
)
target_include_directories(imgui INTERFACE
    Vendor/imgui-docking
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends
    Vendor/imgui-docking/misc/cpp
)
target_include_directories(imgui SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.4.304.1/include
    C:/Users/zhaoys-c/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3cd4fd5b105e4808a2c178353b65ecf1/include
)
target_compile_definitions(imgui PRIVATE
    NOMINMAX
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-G>
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(imgui PRIVATE cxx_std_14)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(imgui PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET imgui PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDebugDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(imgui PRIVATE
    slang
    shaderc_combined
    spirv-cross-core
    spirv-cross-cpp
    spirv-cross-glsl
    spirv-cross-hlsl
    dxcompiler
    vulkan-1
    glfw3
    opengl32
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
)
target_link_directories(imgui PRIVATE
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.4.304.1/lib
    C:/Users/zhaoys-c/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3cd4fd5b105e4808a2c178353b65ecf1/lib
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target imgui
target_sources(imgui PRIVATE 
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui_demo.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui_draw.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui_tables.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui_widgets.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/misc/cpp/imgui_stdlib.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends/imgui_impl_vulkan.cpp
)
# private headers for target imgui
target_sources(imgui PRIVATE FILE_SET HEADERS FILES
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imconfig.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imgui_internal.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imstb_rectpack.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imstb_textedit.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/imstb_truetype.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/misc/cpp/imgui_stdlib.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends/imgui_impl_glfw.h
    Vendor/imgui-docking/backends/imgui_impl_vulkan.h
)
